thread.title: Volkswagen T-Roc concept is ready for fun in the sun - Roadshow
thread.title_full: Volkswagen T-Roc concept is ready for fun in the sun - Roadshow

author: Andrew Krok
title: Volkswagen T-Roc concept is ready for fun in the sun - Roadshow
text:
Volkswagen T-Roc concept is ready for fun in the sun 
The Volkswagen T-Roc concept debuted at the Geneva Motor Show in 2014. Photo by: Volkswagen 
It came back to Geneva this year, but not because Volkswagen ran out of concepts. Photo by: Volkswagen 
The T-Roc will become a production model by year's end, albeit only in Europe. Photo by: Volkswagen 
If you want to get your hands on a T-Roc in the US, you'll have to wait until 2019. Photo by: Volkswagen 
The name may change for the US market, too, and I think that's a good thing. Photo by: Volkswagen 
T-Roc is less a vehicle name and more of a nickname one earns in prison. Photo by: Volkswagen 
The coolest feature on the T-Roc probably won't come to production, though. Photo by: Volkswagen 
But who doesn't want a crossover with a removable roof panel? It works for Jeep... Photo by: Volkswagen 
When it arrives in the US, it will slot beneath the US-spec Tiguan in terms of size and price. Photo by: Volkswagen 
And now we play the waiting game... Photo by: Volkswagen
